TopicTitle: A request and idea for scientific rover parts for KSP 0.22

Articles.Content:
Mod-creators, You should make a mod with some rover parts which will automatically take surface samples. You can also add tracks.

Please mak one for KSP 0.22.

Are you seriously requesting a mod to be made for KSP 0.22? That version dates from November 2013 and is hopelessly outdated.

If you bought the game from either SQUAD or Steam updating to KSP 1.0.X is totally free. And what you're asking is probably already available for that version.

Unfortunately, almost no modder is going to put in the effort to make a variant mod part for an obsolete version of KSP. The latest version of KSP is 1.0.2, which can be bought on the steam store or [https://kerbalspaceprogram.com](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com) if a copy of ksp is not already owned. Please accept this gracious gift of a pony instead.
